Program Configuration

Before you do anything read "Manual.pdf"

Rayserve configuration is split into three sections. Begin by completing the first section below then press the "Continue" button.

These are the main configuration settings for the Rayserve program. Default values have already been entered in some fields, you can change these if you wish.

Section 1

1.   Delimiter used by Rayserve Default value "|" will be used
2.   Delimiter used by Rayserve Default value "~" will be used
3.   Currency symbol, position & format     (Show Details)      
4.  Date format.
5.   A fixed charge added to or deducted from all items.
6.   A percentage added to or deducted from all items.  
7.   A tax added to all items.
8.   A long stay percentage discount.  
9.   Length of stay at which discount applies.
10.   What you want to call the fixed charge.
11.  What you want to call the percentage charge.
12.  What you want to call the tax.
13.  What you want to call the long stay discount.
14.  Booking deposit applied as. Percentage     Fixed Amount
15.  Amount (or percentage) of deposit.
16.  Your company name.
17.  Email address of your company.
18.  Location of and name of the reservation processing script.  
19.  URL for secure server or secure form.
20.  Booking reference prefix.
21.  Post/Zip Code a required field. Yes     No
22.  County/State a required field. Yes     No
23.  Show table with borders. Yes     No
